name: @wonderlandengine/network-example-server
description: Example for a multi-user server on Wonderland Cloud.

scripts.start:server: cd ../../server && yarn build && LOG_LEVEL=debug && export CLI=false && yarn start --local=true --packagePath=../example/server/netcode-example-server-v1.0.0.tgz --packageName=netcode-example-server
scripts.start:audio:dev: export AUDIO_DEBUG=1 && export AUDIO_POSITION_DEBUG=1 && yarn start

author: Wonderland GmbH
